pages.disclaimer: Disclaimer | Important Information about Fantasy Cricket on StrikeFantasy StrikeFantasy Home About us Services Сontact Disclaimer Participation in fantasy cricket contests on StrikeFantasy involves financial risk, and users should only play with funds they can afford to lose. We do not guarantee winnings, and users may lose their entire investment. Fantasy cricket is a skill-based game where success depends on strategic team selection and knowledge of the sport. However, outcomes are influenced by real-life events and player performances, which are beyond our control. While we strive to provide a fair and enjoyable gaming experience, we do not guarantee any specific outcomes or results. Player performances in real-life matches may vary, affecting fantasy cricket scores and contest standings. StrikeFantasy may integrate with third-party platforms for payment processing, analytics, and other services. We are not responsible for the actions or policies of these third parties and encourage users to review their terms and privacy policies. Users are responsible for ensuring compliance with relevant laws and regulations governing online gaming and gambling in their jurisdiction. StrikeFantasy does not provide legal advice, and users should seek guidance from legal professionals if uncertain. We promote responsible gaming practices and encourage users to set limits on their spending and gameplay. Users should avoid chasing losses and take breaks when needed to maintain a healthy balance. StrikeFantasy is intended for users aged 18 and above. We do not knowingly allow minors to participate in fantasy cricket contests, and users must confirm their age upon registration. References to specific players, teams, or leagues on StrikeFantasy do not constitute endorsement or sponsorship by those entities. We provide fantasy cricket as a form of entertainment and do not have any direct affiliation with professional cricket organizations. StrikeFantasy@gmail.com. We strive to maintain uninterrupted access to the StrikeFantasy platform, but we cannot guarantee 100% uptime. Technical issues, maintenance, and other factors may temporarily affect platform availability. Users are responsible for safeguarding their account credentials and ensuring the security of their devices. StrikeFantasy is not liable for any unauthorized access to user accounts or misuse of personal information. StrikeFantasy is committed to maintaining the integrity of its contests and preventing cheating or unfair practices. Users found to be in violation of our terms of service may be subject to account suspension or termination. While we strive to provide accurate and up-to-date information, we cannot guarantee the accuracy or completeness of data on StrikeFantasy. Users should verify information before making decisions based on it. Users agree to indemnify and hold harmless StrikeFantasy and its affiliates from any claims, damages, or losses arising from their use of the platform, including but not limited to legal fees and expenses. StrikeFantasy@gmail.com. In no event shall StrikeFantasy or its affiliates be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages arising from the use of its platform, including but not limited to loss of profits or data. We reserve the right to update or modify this disclaimer at any time without prior notice. Users are encouraged to review the disclaimer periodically for any changes. By accessing and using StrikeFantasy, users acknowledge and agree to be bound by the terms of this disclaimer. If you do not agree with any part of this disclaimer, you should refrain from using the platform. If any provision of this disclaimer is deemed invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect. This disclaimer shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws, without regard to its conflict of law principles. Any disputes arising from this disclaimer shall be resolved through arbitration. pages.index: StrikeFantasy - Your Ultimate Destination for Fantasy Cricket StrikeFantasy Home About us Services Сontact StrikeFantasy - Unleash Your Cricket Dreams Welcome to StrikeFantasy, the ultimate platform for fantasy cricket aficionados! Create your dream team, strategize like a pro, and compete against players worldwide. Stay ahead with real-time match updates, player statistics, and expert analyses to enhance your gameplay. Whether you're a seasoned veteran or a newcomer, StrikeFantasy offers everything you need to immerse yourself in the thrilling world of fantasy cricket. Join us today and make every match a victory! Download Unmatched Expertise Real-Time Updates User-Friendly Interface Exciting Rewards Comprehensive Resources Active Community About us Welcome to StrikeFantasy, where cricket enthusiasts from all corners of the world converge to create, compete, and conquer in the thrilling arena of fantasy cricket. At StrikeFantasy, our mission is to provide an unparalleled fantasy cricket experience that combines excitement, strategy, and community. StrikeFantasy was founded by a team of avid cricket fans and seasoned fantasy sports experts who wanted to bring a fresh and innovative approach to the world of fantasy cricket. Our passion for the game and our commitment to excellence drive us to deliver a platform that meets the needs of both novice players and seasoned veterans. At StrikeFantasy, we envision a world where every cricket fan can experience the thrill of the game in a new and interactive way. We strive to create a platform that not only entertains but also educates and engages our users, making fantasy cricket a fun and rewarding experience for everyone. Become a part of the StrikeFantasy family and take your love for cricket to the next level. Whether you’re here to win big, learn more about the game, or connect with fellow cricket lovers, StrikeFantasy is the place for you. Let’s embark on this exciting journey together and make every match a memorable one! Have questions or need assistance? Our dedicated support team is here to help. Reach out to us anytime, and we'll be happy to assist you. Welcome to StrikeFantasy – where your cricket dreams come to life! WHY STRIKEFANTASY IS YOUR CHOICE Choosing the right platform for your fantasy cricket experience is crucial, and here at StrikeFantasy, we offer unparalleled features and benefits that make us the top choice for cricket enthusiasts. Here’s why StrikeFantasy stands out from the rest: Unmatched Expertise Benefit from the insights of our seasoned cricket analysts and top-tier fantasy tips. Our experts provide you with the strategies and information you need to dominate the game. Real-Time Updates Stay informed with live scores, player stats, and match insights. Our real-time updates ensure you make the most informed decisions and stay ahead of the competition. User-Friendly Interface Enjoy a seamless and intuitive platform designed for both beginners and pros. Our user-friendly interface ensures a smooth and enjoyable experience, allowing you to focus on your game. Exciting Rewards Compete for exclusive prizes and rise up the leaderboards. Our exciting reward system keeps the competition thrilling and gives you a chance to win big. Comprehensive Resources Access in-depth guides, tutorials, and expert analyses to sharpen your strategy. We provide all the resources you need to enhance your skills and succeed in the world of fantasy cricket. Active Community Engage with a passionate community of cricket fans and share your experiences. Join discussions, exchange strategies, and make new friends who share your love for cricket. FAQ'S Q: How do I create a team on StrikeFantasy? A: To create a team, sign up or log in to your account, go to the "Create Team" section, and select your players within the given budget. Make sure to balance your team with a mix of batsmen, bowlers, all-rounders, and a wicket-keeper. Q: How are points calculated? A: Points are awarded based on players' real-life performances in matches. This includes runs scored, wickets taken, catches, and other key actions. Detailed points breakdown can be found in the "Scoring System" section on our website. Q: Can I edit my team after submitting it? A: Yes, you can edit your team before the match deadline. After the match starts, team changes are not allowed. Make sure to finalize your team well before the deadline. Q: What are the different types of contests available? A: We offer a variety of contests including Head-to-Head, Small Leagues, Mega Contests, and Practice Contests. Each contest type has different entry fees and prize structures to suit different preferences and skill levels. Q: How do I withdraw my winnings? A: To withdraw your winnings, go to the "My Account" section and select "Withdraw Funds." Enter the amount you wish to withdraw and choose your preferred withdrawal method. Follow the instructions to complete the process. Q: What should I do if I encounter a problem? A: If you experience any issues, our support team is here to help. Visit the "Contact Us" section and reach out via email or live chat. We aim to resolve all queries promptly to ensure you have a smooth experience on StrikeFantasy. How to Play? Welcome to StrikeFantasy! Whether you're a seasoned player or new to fantasy cricket, our easy-to-follow guide will help you get started and master the game. Step 1: Sign Up or Log In Begin by creating an account on StrikeFantasy. If you already have an account, simply log in with your credentials. link bellow. Step 2: Create Your Team Navigate to the "Create Team" section. You'll be given a virtual budget to select a combination of batsmen, bowlers, all-rounders, and a wicket-keeper. Make sure your team is balanced and within the budget constraints. Step 3: Join Contests Explore the various contests available, including Head-to-Head, Small Leagues, Mega Contests, and Practice Contests. Select a contest that suits your preference and enter your team. Step 4: Monitor Live Matches Keep track of live matches to see how your chosen players are performing. Our real-time updates ensure you’re always in the loop. Step 5: Score Points Earn points based on your players' real-life performances. Runs scored, wickets taken, catches, and other key actions contribute to your total score. Check the "Scoring System" section for a detailed breakdown. Step 6: Win Rewards Compete against other players and climb the leaderboards to win exciting prizes. The better your team performs, the higher your chances of winning. Step 7: Withdraw Winnings If you win, you can easily withdraw your winnings. Go to the "My Account" section, select "Withdraw Funds," and follow the instructions to transfer your earnings to your preferred method. Step 8: Stay Engaged Join our active community, participate in discussions, share strategies, and stay updated with the latest cricket news and expert insights. Enjoy the thrill of fantasy cricket on StrikeFantasy and turn your passion for cricket into exciting rewards! pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy | Protecting Your Information at StrikeFantasy StrikeFantasy Home About us Services Сontact Privacy Policy We collect personal information such as name, email address, and location to create and manage user accounts. Additionally, we may collect device information and usage data to improve our services and provide personalized experiences. Users have the option to provide additional information such as profile pictures and social media links, but this is not mandatory. Personal information is used to facilitate account management, provide customer support, and personalize user experiences. We may also use aggregated data for analytics and to improve our platform. We do not sell or rent personal information to third parties for marketing purposes. We implement industry-standard security measures to protect user data from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure. This includes encryption, firewalls, and regular security audits. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security. We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance user experience, analyze trends, and track user interactions with our platform. Users can manage cookie preferences through their browser settings. Please note that disabling cookies may affect the functionality of certain features. We may integrate third-party services such as payment processors and analytics providers to enhance our platform. These services may have their own privacy policies and terms of service, which users should review before engaging with them. We are not responsible for the practices of third-party services. We retain personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. Users can request deletion of their account and associated data at any time. StrikeFantasy is not intended for children under the age of 18, and we do not knowingly collect personal information from minors. If we become aware that we have inadvertently collected personal information from a child under 18, we will take steps to delete such information as soon as possible. We may update this privacy policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify users of any material changes by posting the updated policy on our website or through other means of communication. Continued use of our platform after such changes constitutes acceptance of the revised policy. StrikeFantasy@gmail.com. If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy practices, please contact us. We are committed to addressing any issues promptly and transparently. By using StrikeFantasy, you consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of your personal information as described in this privacy policy. If you do not agree with any part of this policy, please do not use our platform. We may collect and store information about your location if you enable location services on your device. This data is used to provide location-based services and personalize content. You can disable location services at any time through your device settings. We may send promotional emails and other marketing communications to users who have opted in to receive such messages. Users can opt out of marketing communications at any time by following the unsubscribe instructions included in the emails or by contacting us directly. Personal information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than the one in which you reside. By using StrikeFantasy, you consent to the transfer of information to countries outside of your country of residence, which may have different data protection laws. StrikeFantasy@gmail.com. We may disclose personal information when required by law or in response to valid legal process, such as a subpoena or court order. We may also disclose information to law enforcement agencies or other governmental authorities as necessary to protect our rights, property, or safety, or the rights, property, or safety of others. In the event of a merger, acquisition, reorganization, or sale of assets, user information may be transferred as part of the transaction. We will notify users of any such event and any changes to the privacy policy that result from it. Users can withdraw their consent for the processing of their personal information at any time by deleting their account or contacting us directly. However, please note that withdrawal of consent may impact certain features or services offered on StrikeFantasy. We may aggregate and anonymize user data for analytical purposes or to improve our services. Anonymous data does not identify individual users and may be shared with third parties for various purposes, including research and marketing. Users have certain rights regarding their personal information, including the right to access, correct, or delete their data. To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided in this privacy policy. We strive to maintain accurate and up-to-date personal information to ensure the effectiveness of our services. Users can review and update their information through their account settings. Please notify us if you believe any information we hold about you is inaccurate or incomplete. Users may post comments, reviews, or other content on StrikeFantasy. Please be aware that any information disclosed in these contributions becomes publicly available and may be viewed, collected, and used by others. Exercise caution when sharing personal information in public forums.
